author: cbs8
title: The Quest to Protect the Diary of Lucifer Continues
text:
Untreed Reads
J.D. Netto, author of the best-selling book series, The Whispers of the Fallen, is set to release the third installment of the series, THE WHISPERS OF THE FALLEN: THE GATHERING OF SHADOWS, this Halloween.
SAN FRANCISCO , Oct. 7, THE QUEST TO PROTECT THE DIARY OF LUCIFER CONTINUES
Published by Untreed Reads, J.D. Netto's latest novel, THE WHISPERS OF THE FALLEN: THE GATHERING OF SHADOWS, is the third installment in the best-selling series, The Whispers of the Fallen . The books follow Isaac, a young boy who discovers a dangerous family heirloom, the Diary of Lucifer.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151007/274988
When the thread of hope is split into two, which side will you take?
After the capture of three book-bearers, Isaac, Xylia and Arundel are beckoned to return to Agalmath to meet the Dark One. Around the four corners of Elysium, Lucifer and his servants are gathering an army-uniting men, beast, Shadow and Nephilin to expand his kingdom.
Hidden in the shadows and holding one of Lucifer's most faithful servants in captivity, the blood-drinkers continue to hunt down Isaac and the others, seeking to retrieve the Book of Letters. Isaac's and Xylia's courage and willingness to fight is starting to wane as they now fear that the path they have taken will claim their lives.
"When the stars blood drink. When the moon red turns. When the snow melts away. That's when Elysium will burn."
The Whispers of the Fallen series has become a prominent presence in YA literature, captivating thousands of readers worldwide. The sequel, THE WHISPERS OF THE FALLEN: REBELLION, was released at BookCon 2014 in New York City . The third book, THE WHISPERS OF THE FALLEN: THE GATHERING OF SHADOWS, is slated to be released on October 30th at Books & Books in Coral Gables, which was voted by Publisher's Weekly as Bookstore of the Year.
Among several articles for newspapers, magazines, and interviews, J.D. Netto was featured on TV Globo's show, Planeta Brasil , which is broadcasted in 130 countries, reaching an audience of 5.5 million viewers.
Interview link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ruiO8vjaykA
For more information, please contact:
Jay Hartman , Editor in Chief at Untreed Reads
info@jdnetto.com , (510) 861-0663.
ABOUT THE AUTHOR
Born in a small town in Brazil , J.D. relocated to the United States during the late years of his childhood. At an early age, J.D. discovered his passion for fantasy stories and alternate universes. Immersed in worlds created by Tolkien, Michael Crichton , C.S. Lewis and J.K.Rowling , J.D. found his own writing voice when he had the idea for his first book series.
Full biography: www.JDNetto. com
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/the-quest-to-protect-the-diary-of-lucifer-continues-300155979.html
